backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that frontend/index.html was updated to set the page title and all meta/OG/Twitter/canonical tags to reference jaysports.in without the www prefix.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that defines Tailwind base/components/utilities layers and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with the page title set to 'Jay Sports | jaysports.in', canonical/OG/Twitter meta tags all referencing https://jaysports.in, and Google Analytics 4 tracking included.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders only the Home page as the sole route.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying brand story text, an animated stats grid (years, products, athletes, quality), and a 4-column core values grid with Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with store address, phone, email, hours, and a validated contact form that shows a success state on submission.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar displaying the Jay Sports logo image, smooth-scroll section links with active highlighting, and a responsive hamburger mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component with a hover 'Find in Store' overlay that opens a modal directing users to the physical store via a Google Maps link at hardcoded coordinates.
Renders a grid section of six sports products (jerseys, shorts, bat, shoes, cap, socks) using ProductCard components with prices, categories, and optional badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Barlow fonts, configuring Tailwind base/components/utilities, defining CSS custom properties for brand tokens, and declaring reusable component classes like cta-primary and nav-link.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Defines the full Home page layout including a hero section with CTA buttons and stats, and composes Navigation, ProductShowcase, AboutSection, ContactSection, and Footer components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with brand colors (oklch), Barlow heading/body fonts, a brand glow shadow, and fade-up/slide-in animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and feature state for jaysports.in, recording one completed feature (updating index.html title and meta tags) at schema version 1.0.0.
